Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Ah, understood! Let me bring back
this horse!
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Neigh! A horse, loyal and true, has
fallen during your adventures!
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL_00>I jest... Well then, which horse do you
want to revive?
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>Wait. Where is it? Where is the <clr:0000>roasted
endura carrot<clr:ffff>?

To revive your steed, I will require one of
those delicious, earthy vegetables...

Or did you expect me to do it without
being properly fed?

Come back here with a <clr:0000>roasted endura
carrot<clr:ffff>, and I will revive your horse.
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Ho ho ho...<sp:1:0:4:1e000000> It was you, wasn't it?
You're the one who gave me that
endura carrot.
For so long my stomach has been
torturously empty.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks to you, I at last had the energy to
emerge from my bud. You have my thanks.<sp:0:4:0>My name is <clr:0000>Malanya<clr:ffff>. I am the god who
watches over the horses of this world.<sp:0:4:0>Grateful as I am that you fed me my
first meal in so long, my appetite still
is not satisfied. What shall I do...
Talk20: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Ah... It's you. What brings you here?
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>You didn't bring enough food, did you?


It merely slipped your mind, I'm sure.
In any case, I cannot enhance horses
without adequate nutrition.
Talk10_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hm... Would you like to revive this horse?<sp:0:4:0>Oh, goodness! It was caught in an
explosion? Poor soul...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Not to cast suspicion where none is
warranted, but...you didn't kill the horse,
did you?
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0> It seems this will not be possible.


You can see the reason for yourself.<sp:5:1:0>
Or must I explain everything?
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>That ability cannot be enhanced any more
than it already is.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughL_01>I can only enhance horses to a certain
point, you understand. Lest they become
more powerful than even me.
Talk10_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>It couldn't be the case. I'll give you the
benefit of the doubt.
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>Your horse is already outstanding in
all respects. <sp:5:1:0>Even I cannot enhance its
abilities further.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>Well then. Which horse do you want
to release?
Talk24: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Now, to bring back your fallen companion.
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>...As I said, you appear not to have even
one horse to your name.

I suggest you find one, befriend it, and
then come see me.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>...What are you saying? You do not seem
to have any horses registered.

You didn't kill a horse that wasn't yours,
did you? <sp:5:1:0>Surely not.

In any case, I can do nothing for you.
Please visit me again after you have
bonded with a horse.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>...Have you not been listening? I said you
have no horses.

Should you form a friendship with a
horse and then lose your dear steed,
come see me.
Talk09_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>You would like to revive this horse?
This one, specifically?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I can do that, of course!<sp:5:1:0> But wait...
<sp:5:0:0>What is this...

This horse says that YOU killed it! <sp:5:0:0>You!
How could you?!

Are horses only a tool to you? <sp:5:0:0>Do you
treat their noble lives so casually that
you'd use them and throw them away?
Do you plan to revive it just to kill
it again?
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm?<sp:5:1:0> This steed says <sp:5:0:0>it does not want to
have its abilities enhanced.

I see that the horse has the noble air
about it. As its companion, it is your duty
to always respect its feelings.
Talk09_01: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Shall I do the same to you?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk09_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL_00>I...jest.


You accidentally struck the horse,
I'm sure.
Talk1004_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>How scrumptious that looks... Yes, that
will be sufficient for me to enhance your
horse's speed.
Ready, set...
Talk1004_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>In exchange for that appetizing meal,
I will enhance your horse's stamina.

Ready, set...
Talk1009_00:
Your horse's constitution will now be
more robustâ€”its body more resilient.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughL>It seems pleased with its new abilities.
Talk1004_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>How delicious it looks... For that, I will be
happy to enhance your horse's strength.

Ready, set...
Talk1004_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Mmm... That looks delicious. Very well.
I will enhance your horse's pull.<sp:0:4:0>Ready, set...
Talk19_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughL_00>Hahaha, I jest... You do not
look appetizing.<sp:0:4:0>Another endura carrot ought to do.
Talk19_02:
In exchange, I can <clr:0000>grant your wishes<clr:ffff>...<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
Those related to horses, at least.
Talk19_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Yes... I can <clr:0000>revive <clr:ffff>loyal steeds that have
died or <clr:0000>enhance horses' abilities<clr:ffff>.
Talk19_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Why the hesitation? I assure you, there is
no need to be frightened...
Talk19_05:
But if you want me to use my powers,
bring adequate compensation...
Bring <clr:0000>food<clr:ffff>.
I don't want just any food either.
Yes, that endura carrot you gave me
was tasty enough...
But you... <sp:5:0:0>You don't only eat carrots.
Neigh!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>Hm. I'm sorry, but you already have so
many hoofed friends.

If I revived one, there would be too many
for you to take care of.

So, I can do this, but only if you agree to
let a steed go. Will you do that?
Talk19_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>...What?<sp:0:4:0>Why are you looking at me like that?
This is not about me wanting to eat
tasty meals...
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>If you set free this equine companion,
you may never see it again. You're sure?
Talk03: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>You do not want to revive a horse, then?
Talk19_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>"The god of horses cannot revive on
an empty stomach." Generation after
generation has repeated that saying.
It means that if you want me to enhance
or revive a virtuous steed, you must give
me food.
Now then, what brings you here?
What do you need?
Talk04: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>Which horse do you want to revive?
Talk19_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughL_01>I want some of those... <sp:5:0:0>What are they
called again? <sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>Meals<clr:ffff>! <sp:5:0:0>Bring me some
of those, and I'll grant your wishes.
Talk05: This is the horse you'd like to revive?
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Choose a loyal steed to receive
my blessings...
Talk1014_00:
Your horse should now be able to dash
more often without tiring out.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughL>It looks quite grateful too.
Talk06: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Select a loyal friend to bring back...
Talk1002:
Now, which trait would you like
to improve?
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>...Hm! I see you're good with horses.
All seems to be well.

The friendship you established with
a horse really is extraordinary.

Remember that such a friendship is
a two-way road. Horses care for you
as much as you do for them.
Talk1013_00:
Your horse will now be able to run farther
and faster than ever before.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughL>It looks excited to go for a gallop.
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Oh dear. This horse seems to have been
struck by lightning. How tragic.

Acts of nature are rare and difficult to
account for... You are not at fault.

Though I might suggest you avoid wearing
attire that attracts lightning so that this
tragedy does not occur again.
Talk1018_00:
Your horse will now be able to drag
heavier objects.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughL>Look at it proudly flexing its muscles.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Then I shall free this horse.


No need to worry...<sp:5:0:0> They are
strong-willed creatures and more than
capable of surviving on their own.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>While I'm at it, would you like me to
enhance any other horses' abilities?
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hm. I can tell that this horse died due to
an unexpected accident. Worry not, this
happens from time to time.
The horse knows that you did not mean
for this to happen.
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>...Wait. You don't have even one horse?
How strange...

In that case, I cannot do anything for you.
Visit me again when you have bonded
with a horse.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>As I told you before...all is well. You have
no horses in need of reviving.

Horses are your friends. Look after them,
and they will look after you.
Talk1007:
Hm... Did you mean to choose a
different steed?
